# Location
The location for this venue has been given as:
```{r}
locations <- venues %>%
  filter(venue_id == params$venue_id) %>%
  drop_na()

if(nrow(locations) > 0) {
  venues %>%
    filter(venue_id == params$venue_id) %>%
    separate_rows(location, sep = ";") %>%
    select(Location = location) %>%
    datatable()  
} else {
  cat("None provided")
}

```

# Documents
```{r}
docs <- venues %>%
  filter(venue_id == params$venue_id) %>%
  left_join(document_has_venue) %>%
  left_join(documents) %>%
  mutate(
    Date = date,
    Document = ifelse(!is.na(title), paste0("<a href='../document/", doc_id, ".html'>", title, "</a>"), ""),
    `Original Document` = ifelse(!is.na(links), paste0("<a href='", links, "'>Original Document</a>"), "")
  ) %>%
  select(
    Date,
    Document,
    `Original Document`
  )

datatable(docs, escape = FALSE)
```

# Performances
```{r}
perf <- venues %>%
  filter(venue_id == params$venue_id) %>%
  left_join(performances) %>%
  mutate(Date = floor_date(date, "months")) %>%
  group_by(Date) %>%
  tally()

if(nrow(perf) > 1) {
  ggplot(perf, aes(x = Date, y = n)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Performances Each Month",
    x = "",
    y = ""
  )  
} else {
  datatable(perf)
}

```
